document.full_text: los angeles forward landon donovan canceled out thierry henry's opener as the galaxy were held to a 1-1 draw by the new york red bulls in an entertaining clash of the biggest spending clubs in major league soccer on saturday.
document.title: henry and donovan on target as galaxy held by red bulls
lines_and_colors: los angeles forward landon donovan canceled out thierry henry's opener as the galaxy were held to a 1-1 draw by the new york red bulls in an entertaining clash of the biggest spending clubs in major league soccer on saturday.
